resources.string: (This requirement was added in some A15 roms, there\'s no direct workaround other then change display resolution)
‚ÑπÔ∏è This app is not in the game system list and is not expected to work, but feel free to try anyway.
Unable to remove game_overlay intervention. Remove it manually through Game Space settings or similar ROM features.

Conflicting game_overlay intervention: %1$s.\n\nThis app has conflicting game settings that may cause issues like incorrect fullscreen behavior or configs not applied. Remove from Game Space library or disable similar ROM settings.
UNABLE TO FETCH CURRENT MODE. COMMAND EXECUTION FAILED. CHECK SELFTEST AND REPORT THIS TO SUPPORT GROUP (ignore this on A13)
Please note that setting backends is experimental and you\'re supposed to report whether you see any difference

Enter downscale factor manually. It can be either lesser or greater than 1. Greater values result in higher than native resolution (oversampling). Please note that some apps may opt-out of these interventions. It is recommended to use integer ratios like 1/2, 1/3, etc...
Enter FPS limit value manually. This will limit the app\'s frame rate to the specified value. Please note that not all apps/roms support this feature and it does not unlock engine fps.
Select how game interventions are applied. Changing modes will require reconfiguring all apps.

- Uses cmd game commands
- Recommended for most users
- Works reliably on Android 14 onwards
- More stable and well-tested
- Resets upon reboot

- Uses device_config game_overlay commands
- Known to potentially cause conflicts
- Allows testing alternative rendering backends
- May not work properly on all ROMs
- Experimental support for Android 13
- Persistant across reboots
All commands are expected to run without errors. (with exceptions of list configs and list modes on A13)\nIf that is not the case, please report it to the support group.
^^^EXECUTION OF THIS COMMAND FAILED\n^^^APP MIGHT NOT WORK PROPERLY\n^^^PLEASE REPORT THIS TO SUPPORT GROUP
\n(it is a known issue on A13)
Root access not available on this device
Your ROM has a GameSpace game list that may interfere with game interventions. Clear it to avoid conflicts.
‚ö†Ô∏è Android 13 has broken game APIs and the app might not behave as expected.
Android 13 usually doesn\'t work with default mode. \n\nSWITCH TO ALTERNATIVE MODE IN SETTINGS.
Alternative mode is active. Only apps with game category (0) in manifest are supported by system
If a game isn\'t filtered to this tab report it to support group at t.me/themedsupport
Switch between Root and Shizuku execution modes
Select default or alternative command mode
